summary: The client requested a sprint for mock login, adding an employee, and searching employees; Mike analyzed the backlog and proposed Sprint SP-002 including User Stories US-010, US-015, and US-001, seeking approval to save and start execution.

actions.task: Review proposed Sprint SP-002 and provide feedback or approval
Save Sprint SP-002 and mark stories US-010, US-015, US-001 as 'In Sprint' upon client approval

backlog_deltas.title: Core Directory Flow including US-010 (Mock Login Page), US-015 (Add Employee Profile), US-001 (Employee Directory Search)
